name: Extract-Dnn-Extension-Install-Artifects
description: Build task that that will help locate DNN Extension Installer artifacts and copy them to the Artifacts Staging Directory for publishing.  Based on the CopyFiles task
author: IowaComputerGurus, Inc.

inputs.name: SourceFolder
inputs.label: Source Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The source folder that the copy pattern(s) will be run from.  Empty is the root of the repo, typically this is blank  Use [variables](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=550988) if files are not in the repo. Example: $(agent.builddirectory)

inputs.name: Contents
inputs.label: Contents
inputs.helpMarkDown: File paths to include as part of the copy. Supports multiple lines of match patterns, however typically the default will work. [More Information](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=708389)

inputs.name: TargetFolder
inputs.label: Target Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Target folder or UNC path files will copy to, default option is set for later Publishing. You can use [variables](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=550988).

inputs.name: CleanTargetFolder
inputs.label: Clean Target Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Delete all existing files in target folder before copy

inputs.name: OverWrite
inputs.label: Overwrite
inputs.helpMarkDown: Replace existing file in target folder

inputs.name: flattenFolders
inputs.label: Flatten Folders
inputs.helpMarkDown: Flatten the folder structure and copy all files into the specified target folder. By default this is true for ease of artifact download

messages.TargetIsDir: Unable to copy file %s to %s. The target path already exists as a directory.
messages.NoFilesFound: No files were found using the search pattern and target directory
